about_the_game:
This is new type of game, which is combined bullet-hell and 2D-acton.
Players dodge or parry the bullets, and attack the enemy directly.
The key to victory is to use enemy bullets to earn combos and inflict massive damage on the enemy.
Find your own unique strategy by getting creative with your equipment as well!

Action

By using attack and guard, you can parry the bullets that the enemy fires.
Red bullets can be parried by attack only, and blue bullets can be parried by guard only. White bullets can only be dodged.
When you parry, your combos will increase and your attack power will be buffed.

Gear

Equipping gear gives you special effects. Equip gear according to your play style and attack your enemies.
